ovdesc.p: This concat file holds the Account id and Message Time defined in ACCOUNT.STATEMENT for the CAMT052 generation.
The service AC.XML.INTRMSTMT.GENERATE will select this concat file and generate CAMT052 message for the records with less than current time.
The records in this concat file are deleted only on the account closure.

desc.p: ID is the time specified in ACCOUNT.STATEMENT
The time is in the format of HH:MM
The service AC.XML.INTRMSTMT.GENERATE selects the ids less than the current time to generate CAMT052 message
The Account for which the CAMT052 is to be generated
